Title: A Story of Children and Film
Plot: A Story of Children and Film is the world's first movie about kids in global cinema. It's passionate, poetic, portrait of the adventure of childhood: its surrealism, loneliness, fun, destructiveness and stroppiness: as seen through 53 great films from 25 countries. A story of children and film is an eye opener, a landmark film and a celebration of both childhood and the movies.
Language: English, Japanese, Russian, Swedish, Polish, Czech, Persian, Dutch, Mandarin
